downloadTitle: Microsoft Managed Desktop - get started with your device
downloadDescription: An end user walkthrough of the first-run experience for a new MMD device

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Managed Desktop - Get started with your device_1910.docx

detailsSection: A downloadable guide for end users that details each step in the out-of-box-experience for a new MMD device, and also provides contact details for the MMD support team.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Managed Desktop - Get started with your device_1910.docx
installInstructionSection: Admins should save a copy and provide to end users as part of rolling out MMD devices.
